The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 04 June is 42,356 (4,902.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 May, there were 115 new confirmed cases (13.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 May, there were 44 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 161% (71 extra cases).
